Articles.Content: Is there a listing of the latest parts that came with 1.03 similar to the Parts List on the wiki page with descriptions? I am at work and would like to research them when I get a chance, so I'll know where to use them effectively.

1.0.3/1.0.4 was just a small patch for some bugs. If any new parts were added, they sure have hidden them well ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T23:10:25Z" title="06/27/2015 11:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Ival70**
All I know is they are some form of radiators and there are five of them and they weren't updated on the wiki.

As far as I know the update added the following parts.

Two static unmovable radiator panels:

radPanelSm "Radiator Panel (small)" in the survivability tech node

radPanelLg "Radiator Panel (large)" in the basic science tech node

Three folding radiator panels:

foldingRadSmall "Thermal Control System (small)" in the electrics tech node

foldingRadMed "Thermal Control System (medium)" in the advanced electrics tech node

foldingRadLarge "Thermal Control System (large)" in the large electrics tech node

> 
> As far as I know the update added the following parts.
> Two static unmovable radiator panels:
> 
> radPanelSm "Radiator Panel (small)" in the survivability tech node
> 
> radPanelLg "Radiator Panel (large)" in the basic science tech node
> 
> Three folding radiator panels:
> 
> foldingRadSmall "Thermal Control System (small)" in the electrics tech node
> 
> foldingRadMed "Thermal Control System (medium)" in the advanced electrics tech node
> 
> foldingRadLarge "Thermal Control System (large)" in the large electrics tech node

Are these just for engines?

> 
> 1.0.3/1.0.4 was just a small patch for some bugs. If any new parts were added, they sure have hidden them well ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

1.0.3 added radiators, re-did the heat mechanics and tweaked a whole bunch of stuff, including aero drag values and Mk3 drag cubes, as well as fixing some other bugs. Changelist for 1.0.3 [is here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/346).

1.0.4 was the hotfix that primarily whacked a nasty bug to do with craft loading.

> 
> Are these just for engines?

They're for vessel heat in general. From what I'm aware, static panels cool the part they are attached to. Expandable panels cool the vessel.

I could be wrong about that though. This needs more testing!
